title: Causeway Point - Dino Playground
blurb: A shopping mall with stores, dining, and amenities.
description: Delight your little ones with an energetic burst of fun at this vibrant water play area at Causeway Point! Packed with slides, trampolines, and spring riders, it’s the perfect spot for kids to splash, climb, and play their hearts out. Every corner is designed to spark imagination and movement, turning ordinary playtime into an adventure filled with laughter and excitement.

title: Snoopy Experience Centre
blurb: Travel the world with Snoopy at HarbourFront Centre!
description: Celebrate Halloween, Christmas and Chinese New Year with Snoopy as he travels around the world at HarbourFront Centre! Kickstart Snoopy's epic world adventure with Halloween as the Peanuts gang take you on a spooky journey filled with thrills, giggles, and delightful surprises! Look forward to a Halloween-Themed Experience Centre for the spooky season. Shoppers who spend a minimum amount can participate in a Grand Draw to win a Honda Freed. There is also the 1st Snoopy Experience Centre in Singapore at Level 11 with an immersive Snoopy universe creating unforgettable family memories!

title: IKEA Family-Friendly Småland Play Area
blurb: IKEA offers family-friendly facilities and play areas.
description: IKEA provides a range of family-friendly facilities to enhance the shopping experience for families with children. These include baby changing rooms, a children's menu and play area in the restaurant, high chairs, microwave ovens for warming milk, and a baby care room. Småland is a magical forest-themed play area where children can climb, run, and bounce. It features spider webs and clogs. There is also a silent forest where they can watch a movie or rest. Småland provides an imaginative and fun-filled experience for kids while parents shop.

title: Parkway Parade Sea-Themed Playground Adventure
blurb: Set sail for adventure at Parkway Parade's playground!
description: Parkway Parade Shopping Centre features a newly installed sea-themed playground, inviting children to immerse themselves in an underwater world filled with excitement and discovery. The playground includes a pirate ship with a crow’s nest, slides, and climbing nets, allowing kids to take on the role of daring pirates. Dolphin-themed play equipment pieces add a splash of fun and creativity, encouraging interactive play that fosters social skills and teamwork. The structures cater to various age groups, ensuring that everyone can join in on the fun. The playground is designed to captivate the imaginations of young explorers with its eye-catching designs and engaging features, creating an inviting atmosphere for hours of imaginative play. This vibrant play area is perfect for families looking for a fun and engaging activity.
datetime_display: friendly dolphin sculptures, encouraging interactive play that fosters social skills and teamwork

title: Ranger Buddies @ PLQ Parkside: Missions Around World
blurb: Dive into the mission at PLQ Parkside!
description: Trouble is brewing beneath the waves. The colourful corals are turning pale and Coco, the Tortoise, and the ocean friends are losing their homes and food. Dive into the mission at PLQ Parkside and teleport to The Great Barrier Reef with Ranger Buddies. Complete the mission and redeem an exclusive badge and 5,000 Plus$, while stocks last. Be the highest spender to win a 4D3N stay at Mandai Rainforest Resort for a family of 4 (worth over $1,500). The period of the stay will be on 11 - 14 December 2025 and is non-modifiable.
price_display: Free to participate, but spending required for eligibilty
